attributes.action: bring back the death penalty & Hard Labor& the Birtch
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its time for this country to get TUFF on people that break the law. Was there not less crime when we had hard labor,The death penalty, & the birch. We here all the time about HUMAN Rights. Some of the crimes that are committed are by people that are NOT HUMAN. So they have NO HUMAN RIGHTS..

We need to change NOW or it will very soon be out of control and its not far from being there.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
